tool_description: Determines when newly earned loyalty points will expire based on customer tier, point type, and program rules.
error_messages: Invalid tier: Customer tier must be Bronze, Silver, Gold, or Platinum.
Invalid points amount: points_earned must be a positive integer.
Invalid date format: earned_date must be in ISO 8601 format.
Invalid point type: point_type must be base, bonus, or promotional.
Expiry rules unavailable: Cannot access current point expiration policies.
usage: Provide customer tier, points earned, and earn date to calculate when points expire. Different tiers and point types may have different expiration periods.
